articles.author: Bill Chappell
articles.title: New image of Milky Way black hole shows a spiraling magnetic field - NPR
articles.description: The polarized light image gives us a "new view of the monster lurking at the heart of the Milky Way galaxy," according to the European Southern Observatory.
articles.content: For the first time, we're seeing the Sagittarius A* black hole in polarized light. The Event Horizon Telescope collaboration says the image offers a new look at "the magnetic field around the shadow … [+3469 chars]
